titles.title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to increase the minimum Federal medical assistance percentage under the Medicaid Program for States to 53 percent.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 7/25/2006--Introduced. Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Secuirty Act to increase the minimum federal medical assistance percentage (FMAP) under the Medicaid program for states from 50% to 53%.
